name: section bar extrusion, aluminium | section bar extrusion, aluminium | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/7637/documentation

Heated aluminium is forced through one or more dies under extreme force to produce the desired shape. A great number of different shapes, and therefore possible apllications, can be achieved by extrusion of aluminium.;[This dataset was already contained in the ecoinvent database version 2. It was not individually updated during the transfer to ecoinvent version 3. Life Cycle Impact Assessment results may still have changed, as they are affected by changes in the supply chain, i.e. in other datasets. This dataset was generated following the ecoinvent quality guidelines for version 2. It may have been subject to central changes described in the ecoinvent version 3 change report (http://www.ecoinvent.org/database/ecoinvent-version-3/reports-of-changes/), and the results of the central updates were reviewed extensively. The changes added e.g. consistent water flows and other information throughout the database. The documentation of this dataset can be found in the ecoinvent reports of version 2, which are still available via the ecoinvent website. The change report linked above covers all central changes that were made during the conversion process.]

The activity starts with the reception of the raw materials before preparation. The material on which this service activity is applied it is not included as input.

All the process steps, which can be attributed to semi-fabrication (sawing, scalping, preheating, extrusion, stretching, sawing, ageing and packaging), are included. Does not include the material beeing extruded, only the amount of scrap lost in waste is balanced as primary aluminium input. Includes the transport of the materials to the plant, but does not include the transport of the product to the customer.
category: C:Manufacturing/24:Manufacture of basic metals/242:Manufacture of basic precious and other non-ferrous metals/2420:Manufacture of basic precious and other non-ferrous metals

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Data-set is representive for European Union
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Avarage technique for European Union. The infrastructure was assumed to be the same as for rolling steel.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Literature, estimation for transport and infrastructure
